price: Basi leteni Kitabu chenu kama mnasema kweli.
footnotes: Basi leteni hoja zenu, ikiwa mnazo hoja za katika Kitabu cha mbinguni, kama nyinyi ni wakweli katika hayo myasemayo na mnayo yahukumia.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
